artist: Artist: Antoni Tàpies; Author: Georges Raillard; Author: Jacques Dupin; Publisher: Maeght Éditeur, Paris
description: periodical; tan cover with yellowish abstract liquid-spill design on cover; horizontal dark hash marks at L and dark rubbing marks within "stain"; upside-down 7 at R; contains loose, folded pages of text and color abstract images; lender's # 135

medium: Color lithographs; illustrations in color and black and white; letterpress
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 253
